biotools.summary: Interactive Python-based interface to the powerful Rosetta molecular modeling suite. It enables a user to create custom molecular modeling algorithms with Rosetta sampling and scoring functions using Python scripting.

bioschemas.name: PyRosetta
bioschemas.summary: Interactive Python-based interface to the powerful Rosetta molecular modeling suite. It enables a user to create custom molecular modeling algorithms with Rosetta sampling and scoring functions using Python scripting.
